import React from "react"; import { Box, Text, Button } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import AllGames from "../components/Games/AllGames"; function Dashboard() { const history = useHistory(); const logoutHandler = () => { localStorage.removeItem("userInfo"); history.push("/"); }; return (
<> Rewards Games
); } export default Dashboard;
